name: Mirror (itch) (serxiolas)
description:
Break the symmetry and find yourself in this platform and puzzle game. 

Keyboard: MOVE: A-D JUMP: Space 

Controller: MOVE: Control pad/stick JUMP: A

Credits: 

Programming & Level design: AdrianTheFrog https://adrianthefrog.itch.io/

Concept Art & Animation: JT

Level & Sound design - Gameplay Concept & Concept Art: serxiolas https://serxiolas.itch.io/
